body:
i'm thankful for [this poem about may](https://twitter.com/lilghosthands/status/991653605529870336) and [this poem about may](https://twitter.com/acmccleod/status/991379434946121729) and [this poem about may](https://twitter.com/sophiekleeman/status/991353046201454592).

i'm thankful for [the rihanna makeup video](https://www.vogue.com/article/rihanna-beauty-secrets-fenty-how-to-tutorial-vogue-cover-june-getting-ready-makeup-face-body?ref=http%3A//instagram.com/), which has so much good energy in it (i'm thankful for [mary h.k. choi](https://twitter.com/choitotheworld/status/992177218066485248) who described it as a "_a delightfully not toxic unit of internet made by a spectacularly famous human_"). i'm thankful, even though i have linked to it like 5 times in these notes and watched it like 50, for [the video of rihanna getting pranked by her friend](http://www.papermag.com/rihanna-video-compilation-iconic-1969072518.html), which provides similar posi vibes.

i'm thankful for [cats still getting used to eating](https://twitter.com/EmrgencyKittens/status/991997330537709568) and [cats dressed as ghibli characters](https://twitter.com/Eva08s_/status/991365453216997376). i'm thankful for [this dog meme](https://twitter.com/Mr_DrinksOnMe/status/991274784926326785), which is the most accurate representation of my job as a technical support worker that i have ever seen.

i'm thankful for [these fragments of early technicolor from the 1920s](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a46tD6sjD58). i'm thankful for [this](https://twitter.com/fakeirl/status/992186815460278273), the best of _the americans_ blooper reels (i have watched all the ones on youtube and so this is an expert opinion), especially the sex scene between martha and phillip. i'm thankful for [this paparazzi photo of kirsten dunst and jesse plemons walking to their car with groceries](https://twitter.com/goldenfiddle/status/992105839967207424), which makes me happy. i'm thankful for [this video of conan o'brien and jordan schlansky getting coffee and being silly in italy](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xVYmcVgfDNA&feature=youtu.be), which is pure and lovely.

i'm thankful for jean-paul sartre's [relationship with the crabs he hallucinated after taking mescaline](https://twitter.com/GoodWillsmith/status/991881094537494528). i'm thankful, even though he is a problematic fave and kind of a garbage person, to be reading t[he new tao lin book](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B078VVL71B/ref=dp-kindle-redirect?_encoding=UTF8&btkr=1) about terrence mckenna and his history with drugs, which is real weird. i'm thankful [to imagine the sean connery james bond "mask off" remix](https://twitter.com/burgerkrang/status/991475096173805568). 

i'm thankful to [imagine getting a "nice" from beyonce](https://twitter.com/imbeccable/status/990436578697908224?s=12).
